scripts.build: browserify --ignore-missing index.js -o ../public/assets/bundle.js --debug -t yo-yoify -t  [ sheetify -u sheetify-cssnext ] -p [ css-extract -o ../public/assets/bundle.css ] -p tinyify
scripts.deploy: browserify --ignore-missing index.js -o ../public/assets/bundle.js -t yo-yoify -t  [ sheetify -u sheetify-cssnext ] -p [ css-extract -o ../public/assets/bundle.css ] -p tinyify
